overview: Shekhar and Jui are married for three years and are a relatively happy couple. Shekhar is a flautist and has a music assignment in France. Before leaving for France, he wants to visit his hometown one last time. So he takes a short trip to Konkan, along with Jui.  In the tranquility and peacefulness of the place, each character recognises their inner discontent.
title: Nirop
